author: trawick
msg: Get rid of some compile warnings on systems with no sendfile and/or lack of
one or more rlimit controls.  (Solaris 2.8 hits both of these.)

author: trawick
msg: In read_request_line(), we don't have to check any sort of EOF flag
anymore because getline() returns < 0 upon EOF.
There are also a few very minor tweaks to getline() -- remove an
unused variable, remove a couple of unnecessary comments, simplify

author: gregames
msg: Clean up input filtering & getline() some more.  Character mode telnet now
works for me, but please beat it up and review.
Submitted by: Jeff Trawick, Greg Ames

author: trawick
msg: Avoid swap-til-you-drop by cutting off a loop once the client closes.

author: slive
msg: Just a scratch of a start of an upgrading doc.  It would help if people
note any changes here that will affect end-user configuration.
